import React from 'react' import { useForm } from "react-hook-form"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { loginUser } from '../../redux/actions/authActions' import {connect} from "react-redux" import PropTypes from 'prop-types' LoginApp.propTypes = { user: PropTypes.object, loginUser: PropTypes.func } LoginApp.defaultProps = { loginUser: null } function LoginApp(props) { const { loginUser } = props const { register, handleSubmit } = useForm(); const onSubmit = data => { loginUser(data) } return (
